languages.text: "И мы приветствуем Вашу Светлость. Мы рады гост{mf|ю|ье} вашего статуса... даже незванно{mf|му|й} и столь нелюбезн{mf|ому|ой}. Кто не запоминает обид, тот не берет на плечи ношу воздаяния". {n}Темноволосый улыбается вам со светским равнодушием и, кажется, даже немого снисходительно.{/n}

"And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И мы приветствуем Вашу Светлость. Мы рады гост{mf|ю|ье} вашего статуса... даже незванно{mf|му|й} и столь нелюбезн{mf|ому|ой}. Кто не запоминает обид, тот не берет на плечи ношу воздаяния". {n}Темноволосый улыбается вам со светским равнодушием и, кажется, даже немого снисходительно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

traits.locale_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: “很高兴见到您，大人。我们很愿意欢迎像您这样的贵客……哪怕是如此傲慢无礼、不请自来的客人也不例外。话说回来，不去计较侮辱之人，也便无需承担报复的重担。”{n}黑发男子以冷冰冰的礼节，对你露出了笑容，笑容中甚至还带着一丝居高临下的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “很高兴见到您，大人。我们很愿意欢迎像您这样的贵客……哪怕是如此傲慢无礼、不请自来的客人也不例外。话说回来，不去计较侮辱之人，也便无需承担报复的重担。”{n}黑发男子以冷冰冰的礼节，对你露出了笑容，笑容中甚至还带着一丝居高临下的意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「そして、あなたにもご挨拶申し上げます、陛下。あなたのような高貴なお客様をお迎えできることを嬉しく思います…招かれざる客であっても、無礼な客であっても。ですが、侮辱を決して忘れない者は、報復の重荷を背負うこともございません」{n}黒髪の男は冷ややかながらも礼節をもって微笑みかける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして、あなたにもご挨拶申し上げます、陛下。あなたのような高貴なお客様をお迎えできることを嬉しく思います…招かれざる客であっても、無礼な客であっても。ですが、侮辱を決して忘れない者は、報復の重荷を背負うこともございません」{n}黒髪の男は冷ややかながらも礼節をもって微笑みかける。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «Saludos a usted también, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nos complace recibir a {mf|un invitado|una invitada} de su alcurnia... aunque no se l{mf|e|a} haya invitado y sea de lo más descortés. Pero, en fin, quien no recuerda un insulto no ha de cargar con su retribución».{n}El hombre de morena caballera te sonríe con una fría cortesía y, por lo que se ve, con cierta condescendencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos a usted también, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nos complace recibir a {mf|un invitado|una invitada} de su alcurnia... aunque no se l{mf|e|a} haya invitado y sea de lo más descortés. Pero, en fin, quien no recuerda un insulto no ha de cargar con su retribución».{n}El hombre de morena caballera te sonríe con una fría cortesía y, por lo que se ve, con cierta condescendencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Bonjour à vous aussi, Votre Seigneurie. C'est un plaisir d'accueillir {mf|un invité|une invitée} de votre calibre... aussi {mf|inopportun|inopportune} et {mf|impoli|impolie} soit-{mf|il|elle}. Mais après tout, celui qui ne retient pas les insultes ne porte jamais le fardeau du châtiment. » {n}L'homme aux cheveux noirs vous sourit avec une courtoisie froide, et peut-être même un soupçon de condescendance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bonjour à vous aussi, Votre Seigneurie. C'est un plaisir d'accueillir {mf|un invité|une invitée} de votre calibre... aussi {mf|inopportun|inopportune} et {mf|impoli|impolie} soit-{mf|il|elle}. Mais après tout, celui qui ne retient pas les insultes ne porte jamais le fardeau du châtiment. » {n}L'homme aux cheveux noirs vous sourit avec une courtoisie froide, et peut-être même un soupçon de condescendance.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Seid auch Ihr vielmals gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir freuen uns sehr, einen Gast Eures Formats begrüßen zu dürfen ... obwohl Ihr uneingeladen und unhöflich erschienen seid. Doch wer sich nie an eine Beleidigung erinnert, nimmt wohl auch nie die Bürde der Vergeltung an." {n}Der dunkelhaarige Mann lächelt mit kaltem Anstand und wirkt dabei fast ein wenig herablassend.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seid auch Ihr vielmals gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir freuen uns sehr, einen Gast Eures Formats begrüßen zu dürfen ... obwohl Ihr uneingeladen und unhöflich erschienen seid. Doch wer sich nie an eine Beleidigung erinnert, nimmt wohl auch nie die Bürde der Vergeltung an." {n}Der dunkelhaarige Mann lächelt mit kaltem Anstand und wirkt dabei fast ein wenig herablassend.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Sizlere de selam olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sizin statünüzde birini, davetsiz ve nezaketsiz de olsa misafir etmek bizim için büyük mutluluk kaynağıdır. Ancak tabii bir aşağılamayı tamamen unutan, misilleme yapmanın yükünü de asla omuzlamaz." {n}Siyah saçlı adam, sana soğuk bir kibarlıkla gülümseyip bir miktar horgörüyle bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And greetings to you too, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are delighted to welcome a guest of your stature... even one uninvited and so discourteous. But then. he who never remembers an insult, never takes up the burden of retribution." {n}The dark-haired man smiles at you with cold civility and, it seems, even slightly condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sizlere de selam olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sizin statünüzde birini, davetsiz de olsa, nezaketsiz de olsa misafir etmek bizim için büyük mutluluk kaynağıdır. Ancak tabii bir aşağılamayı tamamen unutan, misilleme yapmanın yükünü de asla omuzlamaz." {n}Siyah saçlı adam sana soğuk bir kibarlıkla gülümsüyor ve görünüşe göre birazcık da horgörüyle bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy
